title: Photographs by Michael Szulc Krzyzanowski
description:
This exhibition showcased Szulc Krzyzanowski’s work of combining multiple frames of images into sequences. As Curator of Photography, David Travis, noted about this work, “In every case, whether time is the descriptive voice or no, Krzyzanowksi
asks the viewer to examine his own conventions or perception by creating a situation that is sometimes only effectively possible through a sequence.”
